name: Fantasies In Bed
description:
It's a simple prototype for Sloyd Game Jam #02 - itch.io. But I missed the submission.

Insomniacs always think wildly. People become anxious when thinking of real things, and relax when thinking of abstract and beautiful things. The main idea of this little game is to pay more attention to your inner thoughts and put aside the trivial things in reality for the time being. You will have a good sleep!

Use W/S or Up/Down key to control the blue block.
